display_long_description:
Horror Company - Night Shift Simulator is a spine-chilling VR horror experience that puts you in the role of a night shift employee working for a mysterious company. Your job is to identify and eliminate anomalies appearing in five different rooms. These anomalies manifest in unsettling ways, disrupting the environment and creating a growing sense of dread.

To track and destroy these anomalies, you are equipped with a special handheld device resembling a radio. This device not only detects anomalies but also eliminates them upon activation. A small screen on the device keeps count of the anomalies you’ve neutralized. Your main objective is to locate and remove all anomalies in a level before making your way to the exit.

To aid in your investigation, you also have access to a computer displaying live surveillance footage from cameras placed in each room. These cameras allow you to observe changes remotely and pinpoint areas of concern before entering. However, relying solely on the cameras won’t be enough—some anomalies may only reveal themselves when you are physically present in the room.

As you progress, the eerie atmosphere intensifies. The dimly lit rooms, unsettling noises, and disturbing anomalies create an overwhelming sense of paranoia. You’ll never know when a sudden event might strike, keeping you on edge throughout your shift. Jump scares, unexpected sounds, and dynamic environmental changes ensure that no two playthroughs feel exactly the same.

publisher_name: Cacao Mobile SP Z O O
